General.Name: Purple Innovation Inc
General.Description: Purple Innovation, Inc. designs and manufactures mattresses, pillows, and cushions. The company also offers bases, foundations, sheets, mattress protectors, bed frames, seat cushions, blankets, and duvets, as well as pet beds. It markets and sells its products through its e-commerce online channels, retail brick-and-mortar wholesale partners, and third-party online retailers, as well as through Purple retail showrooms. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Lehi, Utah.
General.Address: 4100 North Chapel Ridge Road, Lehi, UT, United States, 84043
